text: Aey eman walo! Mard doosray mardon ka mazak na urayen mumkin hai kay yeh unn say behtar ho aur na orten orton ka mazak urayen mumkin hai kay yeh unn say behtar hon aur aapas mein aik doosray ko aib na lagao aur na kissi ko buray laqab do eman kay baad fisq bura naam hai aur jo toba na keren wohi log zalim hain
